"-A-Party" Hairbrush: This hairbrush has a built-in party mode that plays music and lights up in different colors to get you ready for a night out. It also has a detachable mirror that you can use to check your outfit and makeup.

"-A-Mood" Hairbrush: This hairbrush has a mood-changing feature that adjusts the bristles' stiffness and texture based on your hair type and desired style. It also has a built-in microphone that you can use to listen to music while you brush your hair.

"-A-Stylist" Hairbrush: This hairbrush has a built-in AI assistant that can give you personalized styling advice based on your hair type and desired style. It also has a detachable-a-mood feature that adjusts the bristles' stiffness and texture based on your hair type and desired style.

"-A-Diva" Hairbrush: This hairbrush has a built-in-a-party feature that plays music and lights up in different colors to get you ready for a night out. It also has a detachable mirror that you can use to check your outfit and makeup, and a built-in microphone that you can use to listen to music while you brush your hair.

"-A-Superstar" Hairbrush: This hairbrush has a built-in-a-stylist feature that gives you personalized styling advice based on your hair type and desired style. It also has a detachable-a-mood feature that adjusts the bristles' stiffness and texture based on your hair type and desired style, and a detachable-a-party feature that plays music and lights up in different colors to get you ready for a night out.
